ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Gemcutter with various Velious gems
ygData.msgSnippet: Ice Giant Priests have the best (if not only) chance of dropping the diamond dust. QdP ... think any of them have a chance to -- but I ...
ygData.messageBody:
Ice Giant Priests have the best (if not only) chance of dropping the
diamond dust.

QdP

--- Jason Brown <jasonb@...> wrote: > I think Ice Giants do, and I
think any of them have a chance to -- but I
> could be wrong(I'm betting I am)
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joe D [mailto:joed@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 27, 2001 10:18
> To: EQ_Tinkering@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Gemcutter with various Velious gems
>
>

> combine"
> > message.
>

> raids,
> and
> still haven't managed to find any. Which giant drops it?
>
> Joe D
